subj-group.subject: Risk-Premium Curve vs. Capital Market Line

abstract.p: The authors point out substantive differences between risk-premium curves for long-term marketable securities and the capital market line and discuss methodological questions of concern to both models. The risk-premium curve is shown to be negatively sloping during recent years.
